name: Unidentified_Advanced_Recon_Force_trooper
content:
A clone trooper was an Advanced Recon Force Scout Trooper in the Grand Army of the Republic's 501st Legion during the Clone Wars. He served during the Battle of Umbara. Operating an AT-RT walker, he survived the initial landing and, under the leadership of Jedi General Anakin Skywalker and Clone Captain Rex, dug in on a ridgeline just ahead of their landing site. As their forces regrouped and rested, members of the Umbaran Militia snuck up behind them to launch a surprise attack. This trooper noticed the enemy sneaking behind them and alerted his fellow men. However, he was killed before he could fight back, shot in the back from atop his walker.
The trooper wore standard ARF trooper armor with the blue markings of the 501st Legion.
